welcome_message:
A minimalistic weight tracking app.
Never lose track of your weight.
nickname_label: Nice to meet you! What do your friends call you?
gender_label2:
Nice to meet you.
Are you a Gentleman or a Lady
age_label: With time we need to be more careful towards our body ...
all_done_message: Your account has been created successfully!
bfp_description: For a truly accurate measurement of your body fat percentage, you would need to go to a laboratory and have a trained professional determine it through clinical applications. This would take time and money. Fortunately, you can also get an estimate of your body fat with only a scale and a tape measure. It may not be as accurate as tests done in a clinical setting, but it can help you determine if you are within a healthy range or if you need to change your eating and exercise routine. When measured consistently over time, this formula will show you if you are losing or gaining body fat.
body_chart_tab1_description: There are several formulas to calculate ideal human body weight. These formulas are based on the height and gender. One of the famous formula is J. D. Robinson Formula
add_dialog_subtitle: Do you want to change your age to
height_dialog_title: You must be growing up for sure!
bmi_description: BMI is a measure of body fat based on height and weight that applies to adult women and men.
reset_app_message: All the data will be lost. Are you sure?
app_description:
is meant for people who wants to keep a record of their body weight.

Weighter works without internet and all the data stored in the application is private. It also give other health related measurement apart from recording the weight.

It does not bother the user with cumbersome notification and disturb privacy. It is easy to understand and use.
